attributes.action: abolish UK tax havens and use the extra £100 billion a year in taxes this generates to pay off the banker's bailout.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: what it says on the tin really. Half of the world's tax havens fly under a British flag, including Jersey, Guernsey, Bermuda and the Cayman Islands. Obama says he wanst to get rid of them and with the support of the British government he has a much better chance of succeeding.
